entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
